rComments: He isn't a great lecturer, but his class was easily understandable and what he wants you to get out of the class is very clear.  You will learn a lot even if you don't put any effort in, and he doesn't require much in terms of reading.  Take him if you want an easy class but still want to learn about Mexican politics from a liberal viewpoint.

He's a nice guy. I think this was his first quarter teaching, so he doesn't really know how to run things. The lectures were boring. He seems to be a easy grader. I wouldn't take this class unless you really need the GE though.
